name: @igor.dvlpr/ad-void
description: ✈️ An efficient AdBlock filter list that blocks ads, trackers, malware, phishing attempts, fake download links, fake search results, and a lot more if you want it to! Things like: cookie-consent banners, popups, modals, push notifications, survey, newsletter and subscribe popups, rating dialogs, sharing, Google Chromecast and a lot more! 👾
author: Igor Dimitrijević <igor.dvlpr@gmail.com> (https://github.com/igorskyflyer)
